name: 2236 A.D.
description: This tale began five years earlier, in the spring of 2231. Mankind has evolved a new kind of communication ability called “telepathy”.
minimum_requirements: 最低配置: 操作系统: 32/64-bit Windows 7 / 8.1 / 10 处理器: 1.8 GHz Pentium 4 内存: 4 GB RAM 图形: 1280 x 720 DirectX 版本: 9.0c 存储空间: 需要 2 GB 可用空间 声卡: DirectSound-compatible sound card
